text: Abdolhamid Fathi (; born 10 April 1948), also known as Abdul Hamid Fathi, is an Iranian fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Iran Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Fencers at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1974 Asian Games
title: Abdolhamid Fathi
